title: Writing in front of posts
content:
Writing in front of posts

Writing some words in front of posts that I will write the blog.

In fact,this is my first technical blog,first English blog also. At the present time,I have konwn that learning English is important to us.What a pity is that I do not take the opportunity to learn it at those wonderful school time. I take it again now, although I don’t know what is too late or no effect to start to learn it. This is why I will wrote in English.

Time always gone too fast. In 2014, I ask myself when I will have graduated as a bachelor? What time? 2018? Too long for me. In the blink of an eye, now is four years later, I am still the same as the man that I am in four years before. No ability no money no anything.

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
